description.narrative: Reiniciar har till ambassaden ansökt om totalt SEK 2.000.000 för projektet "Samlingsprocess för Patriotiska Unions offer och deras rättigheter inför bildandet och deltagande i en sanningskommission som ett bidrag till fredsprocessen". Projektet utgör en förfas inför kommande fredsavtal med ev inrättande av en sanningskommission. Ett pilotprojektet i tre regioner ingår som en del i projektet. Insatsen har tre delmål, 1) Aktivt deltagande av Patriotiska Unionens offer i processen för inrättande av en ev sanningskommission 2) Pilotprojekt som en del av inrättandet av en sanningskommission 3) Etablera en vittnesmålsbank med 100 vittnesmål. Insatsens totala budget är SEK 2.000.000. Reiniciar bidrar själv med en mindre del till projektet.

Support to Patriotic Union-UP victims in ensuring the right of truth of Colombian society through effective communicative pedagogy on the Patriotic Union, as victims and contribute to their dignity and guarantees of non-repetition.

description.narrative:
General question: Results related to the intended outcome 2017Question: Summarise results related to the intended outcome (this information will be sent to Open Aid)Answer: When the project was formulated, the UP victims considered there were 2 scenarios for them to participate in the Construction of a truth Commission. Now, it is clear that their participation will be in the Truth Commission created by the Havana Agreements between the government and FARC, therefore they have oriented their actions to prepare UP members for their participation in this space. Specific results: 1. Regional Victims workshops: these activities are workshops designed with three objectives (1) reflect on the meaning and value of a truth commission as repair mechanism, (2) collectively build criteria for selecting which UP cases would go to the Truth Commission and (3) select -in a participatory way- the cases for the Truth Commission simulations that will take place in the upcoming months. To the time of reporting (July 30, 2016) 3 regional workshops - out of 8- workshops were done with a participation of 235 people of which 108 were women (46%). These workshops where in the regions of Antioquia-Uraba; Magadalena Medio and; Meta-Guaviare. The remaining 5 workshop are planned to take place between august and spetember 2016.
2.Meetings with the National Coordination of the UP Victims movement: the goal of these meetings is to construct a proposal for the implementation of a Truth Commission regional pilot. Until now, 13 out of 25 meetings have taken place.
3. Participation in impact scenarios: Corporación Reinicar participated in the 157 session of the Interamerican Human Rights Commission -CIDH- during the month of April. In this period they met with the CIDH´s commissionate for Colombia and the secreatriat team responsible for the UP cases in the CIDH. Corporación Reiniciar has also participated in the Transitional Justice Working Table, which is an space designed to provide regulatory initiatives in terms of the different components of the system of transitional justice and advocacy strategies for the implementation of the agreement.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
